1.text: Cut out a piece of wrapping paper about 3 times the size of your present.

2.text: Scoot the present close to one corner on the diagonal.

3.text: Fold the corner up and over the present, then hold it in place.

4.text: Pull the left edge of the paper over the left side of the present.

5.text: Tape the left side of the paper to the present.

6.text: Fold and tape the right side of the paper over the present.

7.text: Pull the top part of the paper over the present, creasing each side.

8.text: Tape the top part of the paper to the present.

9.text: Add bows, twine, or ribbon to finish off your gift.

10.text: Cut out a piece of wrapping paper that’s about 3 times the size of your gift.

11.text: Place your gift in the center of the paper, then tape down the top edge.

12.text: Push in the left side and make a deep crease.

13.text: Do the same thing to the right side of the paper.

14.text: Fold the 2 triangles on top of each other over the gift.

15.text: Fold the remaining wrapping paper over the gift and tape the sides down.

16.text: Push the remaining paper in and tape it down.

17.text: Cut a piece of fabric into a square about 3 times the size of the gift.

18.text: Place the gift in the center of the square and fold up the bottom corner.

19.text: Fold the top corner of the fabric over the top of the gift.

20.text: Tie the 2 excess ends together on top of the gift.

21.text: Put a small decoration in the center of the knot as a final touch.
